title: RITO plz
body:
couple of days back i got banned for things i did not do, so i posted on the help & support page on the riot games page i got no help. the person says i got banned for scripts when i have never used scripts or any kind of 3rd party software. i even told him i video proof of my game cuz i record my game. i wanted my account back because i have spent years on years playing on that account and spent a lot of money on it. the person just its not in his hand to do this stuff. he wasn't helping at all so i wanted to come onto the league of legends boards for help.
if a riot person wants the recordings i am happy to email them to you
thank you,
